nodes.text: Expeditionary Force Alpha was a fleet used by the Erighal family of the Chiss Ascendancy. It consisted of several patrol ships. Expeditionary Force Alpha was brought into service when a family emergency was declared, gathering Erighal officers and warriors from the Chiss Expansionary Defense Fleet above Copero. Expeditionary Force Alpha was present for a skirmish above Hoxim, the culmination of a plot to destroy the Chiss Ascendancy.
